name: Delivery Misery
description:
It's your first day at your new job, and all you have to do is deliver some pizzas. Sounds easy, right? Well, not in this town. The houses are arranged a bit weird. Plus you bounce of pretty much everything and you only have a short amount of time for each delivery.

I've worked only 7 days on this game, so it's not very polished.

Controls
  • Accelerate - W / Up key
  • Brake and accelerate backwards - S / Down key
  • Steering - A and D / Right key and Left key
  • Deliver and bring money - Shift / Space
Known bugs
  • In the tutorial you can already see the box before it swipes in
